import React, { useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Container, Row, Col, Form, Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import List from './List' const Home = () => { const [userField, setUserField] = useState({ firstname: "", lastname: "", email: "" }) const changeUser = (e) => { setUserField({ ...userField, [e.target.type]: e.target.Value }) console.log(userField) } const onSumbitChange = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const responce = await axios.post('http://localhost:3001/create' ,userField); console.log(responce) } catch (err) { console.log(err) } } return (
